title: Preparation & Periphery Lab

The preparation with its periphery in room GW 0.303 offers a combined Pt-/Au-sputter and C-coating unit, an ion slicer, a cross-section polisher, a vacuum-dry oven and a fume hood.  
Tutorials how to operate the SEM are provided here in the respective section.
